SELECT idx, title, ctent, writer, res_state_cd, wrt_tm FROM prod_inqry ORDER BY wrt_tm LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prod_inqry (idx, prod_idx, user_idx, title, ctent, writer) VALUES (#{idx}, #{prod_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{title}, #{ctent})

mapper.update: UPDATE prod_inqry SET title = #{title}, ctent = #{ctent}, wrt_tm = now() WHERE idx = #{idx} AND user_idx = #{user_idx}
